nodes.text: The Kag'areth Queen's Nest was an abandoned facility located in a canyon branching off of Outpost Victory, a military outpost of the Balmorran resistance in the Gorinth Canyon on the planet Balmorra. Adjacent to Talon's Reach, the facility was overrun by Colicoids of the Kag'areth nest, and the Kag'areth Queen made her nest in the lower levels until a bounty hunter arrived and wiped out the nest.
